Reference

All functions

calc_biomass()

Calculate biomass from DBH data in fd_inventory()

calc_lai()

Function that returns LAI values at the plot scale

fd_canopy_structure()

Canopy structural traits from 2D canopy LiDAR.

fd_canopy_structure_summary()

Summary data for canopy structural data

fd_ceptometer()

Ceptometer data.

fd_hemi_camera()

Hemispherical camera data.

fd_hemi_camera_summary()

Summary data for hemispherical camera data.

fd_inventory()

Forest inventory data for the 32 FoRTE subplots. Includes diameter-at-breast-height (DBH) measurements in units of cm as well as information on health (i.e. see health_status column where D = dead, M = moribund, and L = live) and canopy status (i.e. see canopy_status where OD = overstory dominant, UN = understory, OS = overstory submissive, SA = sapling, and NA is a blank or missing record)

fd_inventory_summary()

Basic statistics generated from the raw inventory data.

fd_leaf_spectrometry()

Leaf spectrometry data

fd_litter()

Litter trap data.

fd_make_release()

Write files for a GitHub data release

fd_metadata()

Data tables' metadata.

fd_mortality()

Mortality Assignments for Girdling 2018

fd_nested_subplots()

Nested subplots table.

fd_observations()

Number of observations in the FoRTE Dataset

fd_photosynthesis()

Leaf photosynthesis measurements.

fd_plots()

Plots table.

fd_publications()

Return a list of all FoRTE related publications.

fd_soil_respiration()

Soil respiration (soil to atmosphere CO2 efflux) table.

fd_subplots()

Subplots table.

fd_treatments()

Treatment assignments

forte_colors()

FoRTE color palette The FoRTE color palette

plot_metadata()

Function that brings in all plot metadata for assignment
